snippet: The inauguration of a new president offers some hope for a troubled country.
abstract: Editorial welcomes fact that former Pakistani Pres Asif Ali Zardari completed his full term in office and that Pres Mamnoon Hussain has been sworn into office; notes that it is the first time such a peaceful transition has occurred; contends it is a hopeful sign that democratic institutions may be taking hold in Pakistan, and urges government to build upon this promising start.
lead_paragraph: The inauguration of a new president offers some hope for a troubled country.
